{{Quote|Behold, [Eothas](/eothas/) is risen again! He is glorious in form and purpose!}}
'''Ivorr the Bright''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A keen member of the [Children of the Dawnstars](/childrenOfTheDawnstars/), Ivorr preaches on the market square of [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), ushering those who seek guidance onwards toward the temple.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  = 
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * Can't be engaged in proper conversation. If you try to talk to him he tells you to seek out [Gaun](/gaun/)'s [temple](/templeOfGaun/) along the [Sacred Stair](/sacredStair/) for guidance on your path.
}}

## Dialogue

Ivorr has a short list of "bark" dialogue:
* Interaction with the Watcher:
** ''"Gaun shepherds us all, traveler. Seek out his temple along the Sacred Stair, that thy path shall be made clear."''
* Between hours 5.8 and 8 (morning):
** ''"The rays of his countenance bathe the world, bringing an end to the night, ushering in the day!"''
** ''"Kneel before him and wonder at his benevolence, feel the warmth of his radiant presence."''
* Between hours 6 and 18 (daytime):
** ''"Behold, Eothas is risen again! He is glorious in form and purpose!"''
** ''"Eothas, light of spring, sun of the world, thou givest me life and purpose."''
** ''"Woe to those who labor in the shadow, for nothing is hidden from Eothas' divine sight."''
** ''"Gaun's sickle comes for us all, yet his light shines brightest for those who embrace him."'''
